Original:
Cheers 乾杯吧是一家位於台灣林口的知名餐廳，提供各式美食和精釀啤酒，我有幸造訪了這家餐廳，以下是我的心得體會。

首先，Cheers 乾杯吧的用餐環境非常舒適和溫馨。餐廳裝潢雅致，氛圍輕鬆愉悅，裝飾精緻雅致，讓人感受到了一種家的溫暖。無論是家庭聚餐、朋友聚會還是商務宴請，都是一個理想的用餐場所。

其次，Cheers 乾杯吧的菜品種類豐富，口味多樣，適合不同口味的顧客需求。他們提供的主菜有牛排、義大利麵、披薩等，搭配上各種開胃菜和甜點，讓人大快朵頤，滿足了味蕾的享受。此外，他們還提供了多款精釀啤酒和特色調酒，讓人在用餐的同時品味美酒，愉悅身心。

除了美食之外，Cheers 乾杯吧的服務也值得稱讚。員工態度親切，服務效率高，專業而周到。無論是點餐還是結賬，都能感受到他們的用心和熱情，讓顧客感受到了賓至如歸的待遇。

總的來說，我對Cheers 乾杯吧的用餐體驗非常滿意。他們提供的美食和服務都讓人印象深刻，是一家值得推薦的餐廳。我期待著再次光臨Cheers 乾杯吧，品味更多美食和美酒，享受愉悅的用餐時光。
EN:
Cheers is a well -known restaurant located in Linkou, Taiwan. It offers a variety of food and craft beer. I am fortunate to visit this restaurant. The following is my experience.

First of all, the dining environment of Cheers is very comfortable and warm.The restaurant is elegant, the atmosphere is relaxed and happy, and the decoration is exquisite and elegant, which makes people feel the warmth of a home.Whether it is a family dinner, a friend's party or a business banquet, it is an ideal dining room.

Secondly, Cheers has a variety of dishes and diverse tastes, suitable for customers with different flavors.The main dishes they provide include steak, pasta, pizza, etc., with various appetizers and desserts, make people happy and satisfy the enjoyment of taste buds.In addition, they also provide a variety of craft beer and specialty, allowing people to taste wine while dining, and happy body and mind.

In addition to food, the service of Cheers to a toast is also commendable.Employees are kind, have high service efficiency, professional and thoughtful.Whether you order or checkout, you can feel their intentions and enthusiasm, so that customers can feel the treatment of guests.

In general, I am very satisfied with the dining experience of cheers.The food and services they provide are impressive and are a recommended restaurant.I look forward to visiting Cheers again, taste more food and wine, and enjoy a pleasant dining time.

I really recommend this place.

Original: 這裡的披薩讓我想起了來自紐約的美味披薩。食物棒極了。墨西哥食物味道濃鬱，份量很大。店主非常友好，對龍舌蘭酒非常了解。這是一個對每個人都有好處的好地方。和一些朋友喝一兩杯啤酒。所有安全措施均已到位。有二維碼，一進去就測體溫，還有酒精噴霧。來到一個遵守規則的地方真是太好了。如果你正在尋找一個有趣的地方，那就是這裡了。如果您想與朋友一起玩遊戲，飯店還提供桌上足球、飛鏢機和撲克牌。
EN: The pizza here reminds me of a delicious pizza from New York.The food is great.Mexican food has a strong taste and a large amount.The shop owner is very friendly and knows the liquor very well.This is a good place for everyone to be good.Drink one or two cups of beer with some friends.All security measures have been in place.With a QR code, you can measure the body temperature as soon as you enter, and there are alcohol spray.It's really great to come to a place to follow the rules.If you are looking for an interesting place, that's it.If you want to play games with your friends, the hotel also offers table football, dart machine and poker cards.

Original:
Facebook群組外國人推薦的。很棒的發現，因為他們有美味的漢堡和很棒的墨西哥捲餅。

漢堡配上涼拌高麗菜、薯條和旁邊的泡菜。我們又加了一杯軟性飲料，新台幣25元。

墨西哥捲餅非常熱（很棒）。我們選擇牛肉作為肉。旁邊的莎莎醬非常好吃。如果能再多一點、杯子再寬一點就好了。

氣氛適合吃飯或只是喝一杯。當我們到達時，那裡有一個帶著孩子的家庭。

期待回去嘗試他們的玉米餅和披薩。
EN:
Recommended by Facebook group foreigners.It is great to find that they have delicious burgers and great Mexican burrings.

Burger with cold cabbage, fries and kimchi next to it.We added another soft drink, NT $ 25.

Mexican burrito is very hot (great).We choose beef as meat.Sansha sauce next to it is very delicious.If you can be a little more and wider the cup.

The atmosphere is suitable for eating or just a drink.When we arrived, there was a family with children.

Looking forward to trying their corn cakes and pizza.

Original: 這是一個喝一杯、吃點東西、享受美好時光的好地方。業主和工作人員都很棒，食物也很棒。  披薩真的非常好吃，是台灣最好的披薩之一。我期待盡快回去。
EN: This is a good place to drink a drink, eat something, and enjoy a good time.The owners and staff are great, and the food is also great.Pizza is really delicious and is one of the best pizza in Taiwan.I look forward to going back as soon as possible.

Original: 當您在林口時，這是一個聚會的好地方。必嘗試的酒是 Don Ernesto 龍舌蘭酒和 Slava 伏特加。如果您喜歡雞尾酒，請嘗試他們的莫吉託或杜松子酒。別忘了買點披薩，麵團很完美，味道也很好！如果您親自與厄尼交談，他是一位非常熱情的主人。這絕對是我在新北最喜歡的地方之一。
EN: When you are at Linkou, this is a good place for a party.The wine that must be tried is Don Ernesto agave and Slava Vodka.If you like cocktails, try their Mogo or Du Songzi wine.Don't forget to buy pizza, the dough is perfect, and the taste is also good!If you talk to Enei in person, he is a very enthusiastic master.This is definitely one of my favorite places in New Taipei.

Original: 在沒有 DJ 表演的夜晚，這裡氣氛輕鬆而平靜，提供令人難以置信的德州墨西哥美食、各種龍舌蘭酒、杜松子酒、伏特加、啤酒等。
EN: On the night without DJ performance, the atmosphere was relaxed and calm here, providing incredible Mexican cuisine in Texas, various agave wines, Du Songzi wine, vodka, beer, etc.

EN: Oh my god, believe in me, the taste of burgers and juicy meat pie, fresh vegetables and soft balance.The seasoning is just right, and you are satisfied and delicious.

Original: 連續住了三個晚上。它很漂亮而且很安靜。和我的同事們度過了愉快的時光。週二的玉米餅和週三的雞翅都是不錯的特色菜。翅膀嘗起來超級脆又新鮮。炸玉米餅也很棒。有時我聽說他們甚至還有玉米餅。便宜的啤酒，便宜的食物，沒什麼好抱怨的。我喝了三杯啤酒後還給了我免費的玉米片😆。 …
EN: Live for three consecutive nights.It is beautiful and quiet.Live a happy time with my colleagues.Tuesday's corn cakes and chicken wings on Wednesday are good specialty dishes.The wings taste super crispy and fresh.Fried corn cake is also great.Sometimes I heard that they even have corn cakes.Cheap beer, cheap food, have nothing to complain about.After drinking three cups of beer, I also gave me free corn slices.Mowing

Original:
友善的老闆從紐約到台灣16年。和朋友一起慶祝生日的好地方，無論披薩/玉米餅/漢堡味道都很好，有飛鏢機玩，價格便宜，
向林口人推薦這家優秀的酒吧。
PS：Coldplay-yellow 是一首好歌。
EN:
The friendly boss was 16 years from New York to Taiwan.Celebrate your birthday with friends. Whether pizza/corn cakes/hamburger tastes very good, there are dart machines to play, the price is cheap,
Recommend this excellent bar to Linkou people.
PS: Coldplay-YELLOW is a good song.

Original: 我在台灣吃過的最好的墨西哥美式菜餚。
EN: The best Mexican American dishes I have eaten in Taiwan.

Original: 很棒的地方，有美味的食物和不錯的酒類選擇，工作人員和業主都非常友好。這個地方有非常好的氛圍和適合各種口味的各種音樂。  如果您在附近，請檢查一下。
EN: A great place, with delicious food and good alcohol choices, staff and owners are very friendly.This place has a very good atmosphere and various music suitable for various flavors.If you are nearby, check it out.

Original: 食物很好，但考慮到價格，我期望更多。加工起司更適合麥當勞漢堡。我們的披薩出來得太晚了，其他的餐點都吃完了。服務生已經盡力了，但他確實需要第二個服務生來幫忙。我可能會給乾杯第二次機會，因為我希望我的經驗不是常態。
EN: The food is very good, but considering the price, I hope more.Processing cheese is more suitable for McDonald's burger.Our pizza came out too late, and the other meals were finished.The waiter has tried his best, but he really needs the second waiter to help.I might give a toast for the second chance because I hope my experience is not normal.

Original: 非常好的放鬆的地方。總是和我的同事和朋友在這裡度過愉快的時光。美味的食物，便宜的啤酒，甚至我記得每次去那裡都可以免費喝一杯，沒什麼好抱怨的！如果您正在尋找一個放鬆的地方，強烈推薦這個地方。
EN: Very good place to relax.Always spend a pleasant time with my colleagues and friends here.Delicious food, cheap beer, even I remember that every time I go there, I can drink a drink for free, there is nothing to complain about!If you are looking for a relaxed place and highly recommend this place.

Original:
食物很好，但最近包裝的品質越來越便宜。我以前點過玉米片和莎莎醬，玉米片裝在漂亮的塑膠容器裡，現在換成了紙袋。莎莎醬比番茄和洋蔥有更多的液體。玉米片已經不新鮮了...

我的訂單之前被取消過很多次，今晚 8:30 我在 uber 上下了訂單，我一直等到看到“正在準備訂單”，以確保訂單已完成。 15分鐘後，系統顯示「正在準備」..所以我又等了15分鐘檢查，訂單被取消了......所以浪費了我的30分鐘。如果你用完了原料/或發生了任何事情，你應該打電話給客戶，而不僅僅是取消它..這聽起來不太酷
EN:
The food is good, but the quality of the recent packaging is getting cheaper.I used to order corn slices and Sasa sauce. The corn slices were packed in beautiful plastic containers, and now they are replaced with paper bags.Sasha sauce has more liquids in tomatoes and onions.The corn slices are no longer fresh ...

My order has been canceled many times before. I have an order on Uber at 8:30 tonight. I have waited until I saw "preparing an order" to ensure that the order is completed.After 15 minutes, the system showed "Preparation" .. So I waited for another 15 minutes to check, and the order was canceled ... So I wasted for 30 minutes.If you run out of raw materials/or something happens, you should call customers, not just cancel it .. This sounds not cool

Original:

Original: 我真的很想喜歡這個地方，但我在這裡經歷了很多低於標準的經歷。這裡多次訂購了生啤酒，我認為大量生產的啤酒價格昂貴，但只能提供平淡/陳啤酒或髒玻璃杯中的啤酒。我妻子的生力啤酒嘗起來像咖啡雞尾酒。雖然在林口吃一些「西餐」很不錯，但價格卻相當昂貴。尤其是他們的德克薩斯墨西哥菜單。我只會推薦這個給剛來林口的人或想吃家鄉食物的人。林口和桃園山下還有其他選擇。

I think that a large amount of beer produced is expensive, but it can only provide beer in flat/Chen beer or dirty glass.My wife's Shengli Beer tasted like a coffee cocktail.Although it is good to eat some "Western food" in Linkou, the price is quite expensive.Especially their Texas Mexico menu.I will only recommend this person who has just come to Linkou or wants to eat food in my hometown.There are other options under Taoyuan and Taoyuan Mountain.

Original: 沒關係。  他們正在嘗試，也許還是新的。   食物是正宗的美國酒吧食物，而且還不錯。  披薩很棒，墨西哥食物有點乏味，但這實際上就像大多數美國酒吧一樣...
EN: It doesn't matter.They are trying, maybe it is still new.Food is an authentic American bar food, and it is not bad.Pizza is great, Mexican food is a bit tedious, but this is actually like most American bars ...

Original: 當我們嘗試點餐時，店主很粗魯，而且毫無必要地咄咄逼人，甚至拒絕稍微偏離菜單（這很公平，但可以在不咄咄逼人的情況下進行溝通）。我買了一個墨西哥捲餅，幾乎沒有味道，雖然廣告上說含有蔬菜，但裡面卻有一大塊捲心萵苣。菜單上的很多東西都被「淘汰」了。一般來說，服務很差，食物也很差。

Original: 我最喜歡的是他們的披薩！在我找到Cheers之前，我還沒有找到任何好的紐約風格的披薩。他們的環境也舒適溫馨。強烈推薦。

Original: 店主厄尼總是很熱情。他提供正宗的墨西哥美食、美味的龍舌蘭酒和精選的啤酒。去吃晚飯，或和一群朋友一起去！這家林口酒吧永遠不會讓人失望，適合每個人。

Original:
歡呼聲中的食物非常令人失望。這些食物讓我想起了我需要存錢的大學時光。我會買最便宜的雜貨，並儘可能長時間地把它們放在冰箱裡，這樣我暫時就不需要再花錢了。但隨後它們中的大多數都會變質或難以咀嚼。這就是Cheers的食物的味道。陳舊且無法咀嚼。

我點了一份玉米餅和一份硬殼炸玉米餅。外殼已經陳舊且無味。而且雖然已經柔軟可彎，卻像是在嚼無味的肉乾…

玉米粉餅除了起司和雞絲之外什麼都沒有。玉米餅很平淡，唯一的味道就是科斯托。由於某種原因，他們把所有的莎莎醬和配料都放在一邊，所以我不得不像吃沙拉一樣吃玉米餅。

食物一顆星，工作人員友善，其他三顆星。
EN:
The food in cheers is very disappointing.These foods remind me of college time I need to save money.I will buy the cheapest grocery and put them in the refrigerator for a long time, so that I don't need to spend any money for the time being.But then most of them will deteriorate or are difficult to chew.This is the taste of cheers's food.Old and unable to chew.

I ordered a corn cake and a hard shell fried corn cake.The shell is old and tasteless.And although it is soft and curved, it seems to be chewing tasteless meat ...

There is nothing except cheese and chicken.The corn cake is bland, and the only taste is Costo.For some reason, they put all Sasha sauce and ingredients aside, so I had to eat corn cake like salad.

One star, friendly staff, three other stars.
